page.title: 19Characters In Haverfordwest
page.content: The town, being the centre of trade and commerce for Pembrokeshire and indeed, being the social centre for the area, has over the years produced many characters--both good and bad--and local nicknames have alwaye been very popular with the townspeople. Here are some examples--Annie Gibletts, Cat-a-Mouse, Cuckoo, Butterjaws, Martha Tay Tay, Boogles, Davy Daft, Boyser, Dicky Fisty, Siggy Wiggy, Massa, TomNeverStop, Domer, Johnny Cockles, Joe Kite, Dipper, Vest and Drawers, Langum Sam, Drifter, Quick Dick, She Cat, Litch and To the Line.
